item.title: SpaceWesterns Magazine v3
item.excerpt: A free online magazine devoted to works with themes from the Western genre set in the vast frontiers Outer-space or having some element of extra-terrestrial travel. Think of it as Space Opera with Western-genre themes: it’s a little bit Country; it’s a little bit Space Patrol.
item.description: A free online magazine devoted to works with themes from the Western genre set in the vast frontiers Outer-space or having some element of extra-terrestrial travel. Think of it as Space Opera with Western-genre themes: it’s a little bit Country; it’s a little bit Space Patrol.
